prop.name: unitCode
prop.desc: The unit of measurement given using the UN/CEFACT Common Code (3 characters) or a URL. Other codes than the UN/CEFACT Common Code may be used with a prefix followed by a colon.

prop.name: typeOfGood
prop.desc: The product that this structured value is referring to.

prop.name: amountOfThisGood
prop.desc: The quantity of the goods included in the offer.

prop.name: businessFunction
prop.desc: The business function (e.g. sell, lease, repair, dispose) of the offer or component of a bundle (TypeAndQuantityNode). The default is http://purl.org/goodrelations/v1#Sell.

prop.name: unitText
prop.desc: A string or text indicating the unit of measurement. Useful if you cannot provide a standard unit code for unitCode.
